data.text: @BryanM_KVUE @KVUE @AWMcKibbin Yep it has done as viruses do it has mutated into a weaker form.  More like the common cold.  #WashYourHands
@RPassov_2022 @BryanM_KVUE @KVUE @AWMcKibbin I don't know maybe cause he's in the news business and it's his job to keep the public informed. Why don't you move on from being bitter about it.
@BryanM_KVUE @KVUE @AWMcKibbin Why is anyone tracking this? Move on. Live life normally… this is just a scare tactic and it doesn’t work anymore.
